title: App Development

branch.title: PandaDoc
branch.description:
Privacy-first anonymous chat app built with Expo (React Native).
Disguised as a document reader.
Uses WebRTC for video/audio streaming.
No data collection or encryption on server; all local.
Each user has a unique UID for anonymous chat.

branch.title: Checker – Staff Availability Tool
branch.description:
Web tool using ML model for face recognition.
Captures image every 15min, converts to grayscale, compresses with ffmpeg, computes average vector to recognize faces.
Backend processes images and stores data in cloud.
Also integrated with Civil Engineering Tools app for reporting.
